Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 7th overall pick, by Capital City in 1987...
Had first career hit (double) on 7/28/1988, off James Staggers (NJ)...
Earned first career win on 7/28/1988...
Traded from Capital City to Bay City on 7/31/1989 (Going to CC: P I. Vaughn, P C. Plasencia. Going to BC: P E. Putz)...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/22/1989, winning 2 games with a 1.56 ERA...
Traded from Bay City to New Jersey on 7/21/1991 (Going to BC: P R. Maddocks, P J. Nord. Going to NJ: P E. Putz)...
